title: Ghana begins building 3rd FPSO (Ministry of Petroleum of the Republic of Ghana)
text: ( Source : Ministry of Petroleum of the Republic of Ghana ) Ghana has begun building its third Floating Production Storage and Offloading ( FPSO ) vessel as part of moves to make the country an oil hub in West Africa . This comes after the
